subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Cappie Pondexter scored 19 points, Plenette Pierson had 17 and the Liberty rallied from a 14-point deficit in the fourth quarter to beat the Chicago Sky, 71-67, in Newark.
snippet: Cappie Pondexter scored 19 points, Plenette Pierson had 17 and the Liberty rallied from a 14-point deficit in the fourth quarter to beat the Chicago Sky, 71-67, in Newark.
